name: Forgotten Torment
description:
This is a really short "horror" game. You have been put into endless hell for the rest of eternity because you have done something..

Controlls

In the game you can Interact with doors.

Movement W, A, S, D and / or  arrow keys.  Interact Left Click PxlJam

This game was made for a game jam, where you have to make a game in 2-days. The  2-days contain the actual development, but not the planning. 

The theme for this jam was Horror.

Everything in this game was made by me, except the font.
